If there's one thing we love more than liquor, its re-branding it.
Oversee the new Student Ad Agency at Grand Canyon University, mentoring student workers and doing client acquisition.
Copywriting instructor in the University's new Advertising Program. Serve as a subject matter expert in the planning and development of several advertising courses.
Immediate Past President - Phoenix Ad Club

AAF Metro Phoenix (Phoenix Ad Club) is a member of The American Advertising Federation (AAF), the nation’s oldest national advertising trade association. It's the only association representing all facets of the advertising industry, is headquartered in Washington, D.C., and acts as the “Unifying Voice for Advertising.” The AAF also has 15 district operations, each located in and representing a different region of the nation. The AAF’s membership is comprised of nearly 100 blue chip corporate members comprising the nation’s leading advertisers, advertising agencies, and media companies; a national network of nearly 200 local federations, representing 40,000 advertising professionals, located in ad communities across the country; and more than 200 AAF college chapters, with over 6,500 student members. The AAF operates a host of programs and initiatives including the Advertising Hall of Fame, the American Advertising Awards, the National Student Advertising Competition, the Mosaic Center on Multiculturalism, and summer Ad Camps for high school students in Chicago, New York City and Washington, D.C.

* Provide marketing communications consulting and creative services to ad agencies, design firms and corporate clients.* Marketing content writer for ASU Enterprise Marketing Hub, authoring University website pages; creating content for Sun Devil Rewards, a new affinity program and app, including push notifications, email blasts, and website content; developing corporate engagement copy for Forbes cover wraps; devising naming options for the new Sun Devil Athletics district.* Creative content writer for National Academy of Sports Medicine, writing promotional and nurture email copy, web landing page copy and print ad campaign copy.* Ghostwrite custom magazines for community colleges for Propeller Communications.* Freelance copywriter for a variety of advertising agencies, design firms, and corporate clients providing content for print, broadcast, digital, outdoor, direct response and collateral initiatives.
Was awarded Senior Instructor title in June 2010.

John Tomkiw
Marketing and advertising professional with significant brand development and strategic experience
November 7, 2014, John managed DD directly

DD is a unique talent: she is a superlative concepter, a creative strategist and an incisive thinker, bringing new perspectives to each project and a level of creativity that is unmatched. Her worldview means interesting takes and refreshing copy, regardless of how mundane the assignment. And she has been at the forefront of the burgeoning world of content marketing and content strategy, using her vast pool of knowledge to ensure that clients looking to develop engagements with consumers get the right approach with the right messaging and the right tonality. Every time. DD is a true pro, in every sense of the word. She can write blogs, ad headlines, direct mail, websites, long and short form copy—you name it. But more importantly, she provides the right thought process behind the writing, to create engaging, responsive copy that fulfills on all needs.

October 5, 2014, James worked with DD in different groups

As senior copywriter for the Arizona Office of Tourism, I worked very closely with DD while an Account Executive at Off Madison Ave. Her copy was always well on-point, but it was her creative mindset that approached projects from a wholistic standpoint that was most impressive. She was never afraid to question, which always made for the best work product in the end, and our collaborative meetings were always welcomed and desired in an environment where work can become stale far too quickly. DD is an experienced, professional and creative asset in the Phoenix advertising market and someone I'm happy to have had the pleasure to cross paths with.

Marketing Copywriter at Arizona State University Enterprise Marketing Hub
November 1, 2011, Lori K. reported directly to DD

I had the pleasure of working with DD as part of a creative team that helped launch CherylStyle, a brand-new website that's a go-to source for ideas on entertaining in the home. As the managing editor and empress of prose, DD brought a rich professional background spanning 30 years in advertising, marketing and public relations that a Web start-up like CherylStyle could count on for wisdom and sage guidance. During those 30 years, her passion for her profession has never diminished, which is one reason why she's well-loved as a colleague, board member and mentor to her students at the Art Institute of Phoenix. DD is an incredible asset to any organization that is lucky enough to tap into her many talents!

summary: Diana Dunaj-Kullman (aka “D.D.”)A turn of phrase. A well-placed pun. Alliteration and parallel construction. That’s the realm this Princess of Prose loves to dabble in. After 20 years under her belt as a marketing communications expert, copywriter and creative director, D.D. is certain you can’t bore anybody into reading anything. She currently heads up Grand Canyon University's student advertising agency. Big fun!• Awarded 2011 "Advertising Person of the Year" by the AAF-Metro Phoenix (Phoenix Ad Club) and Ad2 Phoenix organizations• Winner of several American Advertising Awards, a Mobius, an Otto and an Emmy• Immediate Past President of AAF - Metro Phoenix / Phoenix Ad Club• Ability to create results-producing copy for integrated marketing campaigns, including advertising,editorial/advertorial, PR and digital media• Received "Senior Instructor" titling designation from The Art Institute of Phoenix• Serve as a "Subject Matter Expert" and adjunct faculty member at Grand Canyon University in Phoenix• Received MBA with an emphasis in marketing in 2010• Gained copywriting proficiency for all mediums, such as print, broadcast, outdoor, and digital• Spearhead all content strategy and management, concepting and campaign development, branding, marketing and advertising strategy, editing, proofreading using AP Style, project management, public presentations, social media outreach and MS Office suite activities to drive project fulfillmentSpecialties: All advertising mediums (print and broadcast), Web content, social media, direct mail, and press releases. Marketing strategy. Experienced public speaker. Workshop facilitation for copywriting, social media marketing, content writing, and branding.
name: DD Kullman
